name: NewsReader
0:
”Alexa, open News Reader.”
”Give me news for Intel.”
”Get headlines for Intel.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: news reader
des: This skill enables Alexa to pull news headlines from Google News, and read them out back-to-back. You can ask Alexa to open News Reader, then ask it to give you news for a topic you are interested in. The skill will fetch news headlines from Google News and start to read them all out.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
